text:
Val Raymond Heim (November 4, 1920 – November 21, 2019) was a left fielder. He played in Major League Baseball during the 1942 season with the Chicago White Sox. He was, 170 lbs. He batted left-handed and threw right-handed.
Heim died at his childhood home in Superior, Nebraska on November 21, 2019 at the age of 99.
